Name: Lofi Checkers
About the game: Lofi Checkers is a cozy version of a classic game when you have a moment to spare. Relax, chill, and enjoy the simplicity of a game which is so universally known and liked. This game includes custom made soundtracks in the style of lofi beats you'd hear on YouTube. If you're studying, this is a good way to relax for a moment rather than get lost in social media or a gaming binge. Featured are a variety of lofi backgrounds to feel a chill ambience while playing a game or two.
Meta Title: Lofi Checkers: Sep 16, 2022, Lodik Isles and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lofi Checkers? Check out the release date (Sep 16, 2022), developer insights from Lodik Isles, and a complete game summary.
